title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy Chromebook 2 from $399, OnePlus Buds Pro $130, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by this Samsung Galaxy Chromebook 2 sale from $399. That’s alongside the first discount in months on the OnePlus Buds Pro and Amazon’s Luna cloud gaming controller hitting $50. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy Chromebook 2 from $399, OnePlus Buds Pro $130, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung's latest Galaxy Chromebook 2 sale starts at $399 alongside the first price cut in months on OnePlus Buds Pro and more.
